think_procedure: The description of the knob 'geqo_threshold' does not mention any special values that would change the function of the knob in a significant way. It seems to be a regular numerical knob that sets a threshold for the use of genetic query optimization. The value of the knob determines the minimum number of FROM items a query must have for the genetic query optimization to be used. There is no mention of a value that would disable this feature or change its function in a different way.
